verses.name: Isaiah 7:3
verses.text: Then said the Lord unto Isaiah, Go forth now to meet Ahaz, thou, and Shear–jashub thy son, at the end of the conduit of the upper pool in the highway of the fuller’s field;

verses.name: Isaiah 7:4
verses.text: And say unto him, Take heed, and be quiet; fear not, neither be fainthearted for the two tails of these smoking firebrands, for the fierce anger of Rezin with Syria, and of the son of Remaliah.

verses.name: Isaiah 7:5
verses.text: Because Syria, Ephraim, and the son of Remaliah, have taken evil counsel against thee, saying,
